About Me

Hi, I'm Utkarsh. I have a degree in computer science from MDU , and I am currently learning backend development at Masai School. My main skills include Node.js, JavaScript, and Express.js.
I enjoy building APIs, working on server-side applications, and solving problems. I am also exploring new technologies like Generative AI to create better and more scalable solutions. I like working with teams, sharing ideas, and learning new things. I aim to work on projects that make a difference and bring value.
Let’s create something great together!

Projects

JScript – A Beginner-Friendly Programming Language & IDE

JScript is a lightweight programming language designed for simplicity and clarity, along with an easy-to-use Integrated Development Environment (IDE). This project aims to help beginners understand the basics of programming by providing a clean syntax, an interactive editor, and beginner-friendly documentation.

Features:

  • Custom Programming Language – Supports variables, loops, conditionals, functions, and more.
  • Interactive IDE – Syntax highlighting, error detection, and an output console.
  • Easy-to-Understand Documentation – Helps users learn the language quickly.
  • Beginner-Friendly – Designed for those new to coding.

Tech Stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
